question: Show journalist postings and editor postings for English and Spanish languages.
sql_query1:
SELECT JobPosting.title 
FROM JobPosting
WHERE (JobPosting.mediaCareer = "Journalist" OR JobPosting.mediaCareer = "Editor") AND JobPosting.languages = "English and Spanish"
sql_query2:
SELECT JobPosting.title 
FROM JobPosting
WHERE JobPosting.mediaCareer = "Journalist" OR JobPosting.mediaCareer = "Editor" AND JobPosting.languages = "English and Spanish"
interpretation1: Which journalist job postings require English and Spanish languages and which editor job postings have the same requirement?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all journalist job postings and also provide a list of editor job postings for English and Spanish languages.
